content.text: The code repository located at /tmp/workdir/preprocess_strands_20260128/easy-rules is currently written in Java 8. Please migrate the entire codebase to Java 17.

reasoningText.text:
The user wants me to migrate a Java project from Java 8 to Java 17. Let me start by exploring the repository structure to understand the codebase and then run the build to see what issues we need to fix.

Steps:
1. First, explore the repository structure
2. Check the pom.xml file to see current Java version and dependencies
3. Run `mvn clean verify` to see what errors we get
4. Fix any compatibility issues
5. Ensure the build passes with JDK 17
